results.content: I am using windows 10 this course is using something 2014. I followed the directions exactly and onlygot to lecture 10 and the localhost is not working / apache is not working. I have spent several hours so far and I am very discourage. I signed up as a beginer and find the instructor rushing thru the lesson. I have to keep putting him on pause so I can do the work. I wish you had written instructions as well as the video. Please, someone HELP.  jmt

results.content: The instructor was good and knew what he was covering. I had been hoping that I would have learned more about how WAMPServer works, which falls into the category of what he calls a Pre-built WAMP stack. He focused on what he calls a Hardware-based WAMP.
results.content_html: The instructor was good and knew what he was covering. I had been hoping that I would have learned more about how WAMPServer works, which falls into the category of what he calls a Pre-built WAMP stack. He focused on what he calls a Hardware-based WAMP.

results.content: It is very interesting to build a production WAMP from scratch. Very usefull to follow step by step the intrucctions.In this course I found many information and  I was very relevant to me. Thanks to the instructor and to Udemy.
